title: Friend Request Bot
body: So i got a friend request today from a random person called IcanHelpYou7 (Sorry for name and shame) but i was really confused so i went to their profile and they were level 1 with 0 xp as well so i was wondering if this is actually a bot and if so you can you tell me what to do? I think i should decline the request but i was wondering if i should give a screen shot to riot or something like that?

replies.body: hi, i'm from euw server and i receive the same invite !
There has been a gigantic increase in these types of bots lately :/
It's a boost bot, when you accept they spam you links. Just decline them, it's ridiculous.
Some random added you, Decline or add who cares.
